SEARCH
Package controller.interfaces

Interface AppointmentController

All Known Subinterfaces:
AdminAppointmentController, DoctorAppointmentController, PatientAppointmentController
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminAppointmentControllerImpl, DoctorAppointmentControllerImpl, PatientAppointmentControllerImpl
public interface AppointmentController
Interface for managing generic appointment-related operations. This interface defines common methods for handling appointments, including:
  • Retrieving available slots for a doctor.
  • Updating the status of an appointment.
  • Fetching details of a specific appointment.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Appointment
    getAppointment(String appointmentId)
    Retrieves the details of a specific appointment.
    List<AppointmentSlot>
    getAvailableSlots(String doctorId)
    Retrieves a list of available appointment slots for a specified doctor.
    boolean
    updateAppointmentStatus(String appointmentId, Appointment.AppointmentStatus status)
    Updates the status of a specific appointment.

  • Method Details

    • getAvailableSlots

      List<AppointmentSlot> getAvailableSlots(String doctorId)
      Retrieves a list of available appointment slots for a specified doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The unique identifier of the doctor.
      Returns:
      A list of AppointmentSlot objects representing the available slots.

    • updateAppointmentStatus

      boolean updateAppointmentStatus(String appointmentId, Appointment.AppointmentStatus status)
      Updates the status of a specific appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The unique identifier of the appointment to be updated.
      status - The new Appointment.AppointmentStatus to set for the appointment.
      Returns:
      true if the status was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • getAppointment

      Appointment getAppointment(String appointmentId)
      Retrieves the details of a specific appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The unique identifier of the appointment to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The Appointment object representing the appointment, or null if not found.
